tags: decided 2 post this to sheezy so i wrote a more elaborated on desc n went. ykw. ill put it on tumblr too LOL
now everyone on the same page :)
body:
diosmaden:

‚Äúhumans dont consort with demons‚Äù <- hilarious thing to say in a setting with cambions in it

if youre new to these two, let me introduce u ^_^

Thistle ¬ª she looks human, walks like a human, and talks like a human, and through Selene’s arcane senses… appears to be nothing but a regular human, but nonetheless Thistle insists that she was originally a mighty lioness. She doesn’t remember how she came to be transformed or anything really of her past, but she knows two things: Her name is Thistle, and she is not human.

Selene ¬ª well as you can see, shes a fox demon LOL she wants to be a fabler, to travel the world and record the history of the people and share with them the greatest of tales she discovers. But fox demons are considered an ill omen by many, mistrusted for their inclination for shapeshifting and illusion magic. She doesn’t fully believe that Thistle isn’t really human at first, and as such keeps her true identity secret. her big dramatic reveal doesnt go as expected LOL ü¶Å meow?

(these two do not feature in heart of the storm, theyre part of their own little story thats unrelated üëç)

“humans dont consort with demons” <- hilarious thing to say in a setting with cambions in it

if youre new to these two, let me introduce u ^_^

Thistle » she looks human, walks like a human, and talks like a human, and through Selene’s arcane senses… appears to be nothing but a regular human, but nonetheless Thistle insists that she was originally a mighty lioness. She doesn’t remember how she came to be transformed or anything really of her past, but she knows two things: Her name is Thistle, and she is not human.

Selene » well as you can see, shes a fox demon LOL she wants to be a fabler, to travel the world and record the history of the people and share with them the greatest of tales she discovers. But fox demons are considered an ill omen by many, mistrusted for their inclination for shapeshifting and illusion magic. She doesn’t fully believe that Thistle isn’t really human at first, and as such keeps her true identity secret. her big dramatic reveal doesnt go as expected LOL 🦁 meow?

(these two do not feature in heart of the storm, theyre part of their own little story thats unrelated 👍)

tags: reworked this ever so slightly to post on bsky today tehe
summary: Leans in really close to you really homoerotically and whispers in your ear the magic word. that activates blast you across the...
body:
diosmaden:

Leans in really close to you really homoerotically and whispers in your ear the magic word. that activates blast you across the room and burn your gloves off no jutsu. and gives you a split second to process that before you get blasted across the room like a wet rag
